isis.stitle: TSI 97-04-02 - Bendix Hydro-Max Brake Booster Leakage Repair

subjectgroup.subject: Bendix Hydro-Max Brake Booster Leakage Repair

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to all models with Bendix Hydro-Max Brake System built between January 1992 and September 1996.

When wetness or leakage is noted on the bottom surface of the Hydro-Max booster adjacent to the reserve electric motor pump mounting, inspect the pump mounting bolts to determine if they are damp or wet. If a damp or wet condition is noted, remove the pump mounting bolt closest to the engine cowl ( Figure 1), clean the threads with brake cleaner Navistar Part Number ZDE MT-20, and apply a thin coat of Fleetrite PST pipe sealant Part Number 554209C1 to the threads. Re-install the bolt and tighten to 18 to 25 ft-lbs. (24 to 34 Nm).

figure.caption: Figure 1. Remove Pump Mounting Bolt Closest to Engine Cowl
